meta.title: TrustMeBro — Secure collaborations for brands & creators
meta.description: Escrow + digital contracts for influencer collaborations (EU & US). Dual deposits, verified deliverables, automatic payouts. GDPR/FTC aware.

home.heroDesc: TrustMeBro is the escrow + contract layer for influencer collaborations. Both sides deposit, deliverables are verified, and payouts are automatic.
home.trust1Desc: Both brand and creator commit funds to start.
home.trust2Desc: Digital signatures with verifiable audit trail.
home.trust4Desc: Admin can release, refund or split.
home.how1Desc: Create a contract with deliverables, deadline and deposits.
home.how2Desc: Brand funds budget, both sides fund deposits. Work starts.
home.how3Desc: Creator submits the link. Brand approves (or auto-approve), payouts trigger.
home.whyBullet1: • Zero ghosting: funds are committed up-front.
home.whyBullet2: • Transparent states: every step logged as an event.
home.whyBullet3: • Fair outcomes: cancellations and disputes handled cleanly.
home.whyComplianceEU: • Built for EU/CH compliance and GDPR.
home.whyComplianceUS: • Built for US compliance: FTC disclosures & CCPA awareness.
home.whyCta: Create your first contract in minutes
home.sec2Desc: Every transition and payout is logged for proof.
home.sec3Desc: Stripe Connect onboarding for payouts and compliance.
home.testi1Quote: “No more chasing invoices. We approve and the money moves.”
home.testi2Quote: “Deposits make everyone serious. It’s finally fair.”
home.testi3Quote: “The contract + escrow combo is exactly what was missing.”
home.finalDesc: Spin up a contract, fund the escrow, and protect both sides. It takes 2 minutes.

security.title: Security
security.intro: We take data protection and platform security seriously. Below is a summary adapted from the TrustMeBro spec.
security.headers1: Strict security headers: CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options, Referrer-Policy, Permissions-Policy.
security.auth1: NextAuth with role-based access (brand, creator, admin).
security.auth2: Middleware enforced on API and app sections; event timeline and audit logs for sensitive actions.
security.payments1: Stripe Connect (Standard) for onboarding and funds flow; signed webhook verification; idempotency at application layer.
security.data1: PostgreSQL via Prisma; indices per access patterns; least-privilege credentials.
security.data2: Files (screenshots) via private S3 with signed URLs (planned).
security.observability1: Sentry and OpenTelemetry planned; correlation with contract/user/event IDs.
security.footer: For details, see the TrustMeBro documentation (Security, Observability sections).

privacy.title: Privacy Policy (MVP)
privacy.intro: This outlines how TrustMeBro handles personal data as described in the product spec. A full legal policy will replace this MVP text.
privacy.data2: Contract data: titles, briefs, deadlines, amounts, events.
privacy.data3: Payment metadata from PSP (Stripe), not card numbers.
privacy.purpose1: Contract execution between brands and creators.
privacy.purpose2: Compliance (KYC/AML via PSP, audit logs, dispute resolution).
privacy.retention1: Retention aligned with legal requirements and dispute windows.
privacy.retention2: Right of access, rectification, and erasure per GDPR/LPD; contact us to exercise rights.
privacy.footer: For production, a lawyer-reviewed policy will be published. This MVP mirrors the privacy aspects in TrustMeBro.md.
